thread.title: First Official Look at 'Ocean's Eight'! See Sandra Bullock, Rihanna and the Rest of the Crew in Action
thread.title_full: First Official Look at 'Ocean's Eight'! See Sandra Bullock, Rihanna and the Rest of the Crew in Action

author: John Boone
title: First Official Look at 'Ocean's Eight'! See Sandra Bullock, Rihanna and the Rest of the Crew in Action
text: First Official Look at 'Ocean's Eight'! See Sandra Bullock, Rihanna and the Rest of the Crew in Action by John Boone 4:10 AM PST, January 30, 2017 Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images No matter what happens, at least we have Ocean's 8 to look forward to. And despite having a coffee table book's worth of paparazzi pics of the cast filming the movie, we now have our first official look at the titular eight in action: Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway, Mindy Kaling, Sarah Paulson, Awkwafina, Rihanna and Helena Bonham Carter. The image shows the ladies inside a subway car in New York City. A photo posted by Warner Bros. Pictures (@wbpictures) on Jan 30, 2017 at 3:59am PST EXCLUSIVE: Matt Damon Reveals He Has a Cameo in Upcoming 'Ocean's Eight' Details on the Ocean's Eleven spinoff are still scarce, but we know that it's being helmed by The Hunger Games director Gary Ross and centers on eight women who "plan and execute a heist in New York." We also know that heist involves the Met Gala as well as a deluge of celebrity cameos, from Katie Holmes to Kim Kardashian West and Kendell Jenner . The caption to the exciting first look lists each character's name in the film along with some more details surrounding the plot. Ocean's 8 hits theaters in Summer 2018.
